org.actus.externals

Interface BusinessDayCalendarProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MondayToFridayCalendar, NoHolidaysCalendar

    public interface BusinessDayCalendarProvider
    Component that represents a specific business day calendar

    Whether a specific date is a business day or not depends on the calendar used in the respective business center. This component implements a specific calendar which defines for each date whether it is a business day or not.

    The actus-core library in fact only provides few very basic implementations of this component (see package org.actus.time.calendar). This set of business day calendars can easily be extended externally by implementing this component (or interface respectively) and passing the external calendar class to the ContractModel when parsing the attributes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isBusinessDay(LocalDateTime date)
      Returns whether a date is a business day or not

    • Method Detail

      • isBusinessDay

        boolean isBusinessDay(LocalDateTime date)
        Returns whether a date is a business day or not
        Parameters:
        date - the date which has to be checked
        Returns:
        true if date is a business day or false otherwise
